adjective.description: (of planetary motion) proceeding from west to east; direct.
(of a metamorphic change) resulting from an increase in temperature or pressure or both.

verb.description: (of a coastline) advance toward the sea as a result of the accumulation of waterborne sediment.
examples: these oolites were probably deposited as part of the coastal sand-barrier complex as it prograded basinwards

origin: Early 20th century (as a verb): from pro- forwards + retrograde.
